Name: Forel Consumable
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Consumable

Resistance: -40%
Instability: +20%
Heat Generation: +15%
Signature Size: +20%
Duration: 30 seconds
Charges: 3

Shubin developed the Forel consumable to temporarily distort a mining laser to produce a unique tremor. The resulting beam reduces a rock's resistance by 40%, but also increases the instability by 20%, making it less stable and more dangerous to mine.
